data.body: The capacitance (\(C_0\)) in this scenario is calculated as \(C_0 = \frac{Q}{V_0} = \frac{\epsilon_0 A}{d}\).

data.name: paragraph
data.body: Now, when a dielectric material fully occupies the space between the plates, it becomes polarized by the electric field.
